channel.title: A code
channel.description:
I need a code that checks your inventory, if anyone knows a code here's a base, I have tried to try all kinds of codes and it doesn't work..
[code]GetItemValue(playerItems[rr]-1)[/code]
Thanks.

item.title: A code
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

See I don’t want it to check for any item, I just want it to look at the item slot in the inventory, get the item id and then from there the Getitemvalue will get the value of it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

I cant remember exactly
But im pretty sure there is a christmas event tutorial where it checks your bank and invent
Maybe have a look for that
Sorry i couldnt be of more help
Good luck with this
Pasta186

Read full topic

item.title: A code
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (hasItemAmount(id, amount)) {
    // Do stuff here if they have that amount of items
}

That’s what I can remember from the classic servers, it’s probably changed though.
But hey, it’s worth a shot.

Change “id” and “amount” to the item ID and the amount of the item that you want them to have (1 works).

Read full topic
